name: zenitPlatformDataBadges

infos.name: Badges & Labels | individuell | Listing & Detailseite
infos.description:
Individuelle Artikel Labels / Badges
im Listing und in der Detailseite

Hebe Produkte im Artikellisting hervor, indem Du sie mit weiteren sinnvollen Labels / Badges versiehst. Zeige Hervorgehobene Produkte, markiere bald ausverkaufte Produkte (Abverkauf anzeigen), zeige Lagerbestände, Versandkostenfrei-Informationen, oder bis zu drei individuelle Labels an.
Mit dieser Erweiterung kannst Du einfach und bequem Deine angebotenen Artikel hervorheben. Die Darstellung der Labels / Badges erfolgt im Listing sowie auf Wunsch auf der Detailseite des Produktes.



› Wir helfen Dir!
kurzfristig und kostenlos

FAQ & Support: www.zenit.design
infos.installationManual:
Wichtig: Theme-Kompilierung nach speichern von Einstellungen nicht vergessen!

Nach dem Ändern und Speichern einer Konfiguration sollte das Theme erneut gespeichert werden. Erst dann werden die neu gesetzten Einstellungen und geänderten Variablen in der Storefront aktualisiert. 

Das ist insbesondere immer dann notwendig, wenn die Einstellungen das Aussehen der Erweiterung in der Storefront betreffen, wie etwa eine geänderte Farbe oder Schriftgröße.


Mehr dazu findest Du unter: https://docs-sw6.zenit.design/faq/kompilieren

infos.shortDescription: Optimiere Deinen Shop mit den zusätzliche Badges / Labels im Artikel-Listing und auch auf der Produkt-Detailseite für Lagerbestände, Abverkauf, Versandkosten, individuelle Labels uvm.
infos.highlights:
Darstellung im Listing
Darstellung auf der Detailseite
Individuelle Labels pro Artikel und Variante
Gestaltung von Farbe und Form
Mehrsprachigkeit der Labels
infos.features: Ausverkauft Label → Zeigt an, ob der Artikel nicht mehr verfügbar ist Individuelle Labels → Mit bis zu drei individuellen Labels kannst Du in deinen Artikelstammdaten Angaben zu deinem Produkt machen. Lagerbestand Label → Zeige den Lagerbestand ab einen Mindestlagerbestand an Verkäufe Label → Zeige die Verkäufe ab einer Mindestverkaufszahl an Abverkauf Label → Zeigt an, ob der Artikel im Abverkauf ist Versankostenfrei Label → Hebe versandkostenfreie Artikel hervor Highlight Label → Hebe Artikel hervor Newcomer Label → Markiere neue Produkte Rabatt Label → Zeigt den Rabatt in % bereits im Listing an Varianten Label → Markiere Produkte mit Varianten Hersteller Label → Zeigt den Hersteller an

infos.name: Badges & Labels | individual | listing & details page
infos.description:
Individual Article Labels / Badges
on Listing and product details page

Highlight products in article listing by providing them with more meaningful labels / badges. Show Featured Products, mark soon sold-out products, show stock levels, free shipping information, or up to three individual labels. With this extension you can easily and conveniently highlight your offered items. The presentation of the labels / badges takes place in the listing and on request on the detail page of the product.



New - Individual labels: Include important textual information on an article in the listing as a label - examples of use: organic label, fair trade label, consumption of bulbs, etc.


› We will help you!
quickly and free of charge

FAQ & Support: www.zenit.design
infos.installationManual:
Important: Don't forget to compile the theme after saving the settings!

After changing and saving a configuration, the theme should be saved again. Only then are the newly set settings and changed variables updated in the storefront.

This is especially necessary when the settings affect the appearance of the extension in the storefront, such as a changed color or font size.


You can find more about this at: https://docs-sw6.zenit.design/faq/kompilieren

infos.shortDescription: Optimize your shop with the additional badges / labels in the article listing and also on the product detail page for stocks, closeouts, shipping, individual labels and more.
infos.highlights:
Display in the listing
Display on the detail page
Individual labels per article and variant
Design of color and shape
Translatable Labels
infos.features: Sold out Label → Indicates whether the item is no longer available Custom Labels → With up to three individual labels, you can specify your product in your item master data. Instock Label → Show the stock from a minimum value Sales Label → Show the sales from a minimum value Closeout Label → Indicates whether the item is on closeout Shipping Free Label → Show free shipping items Highlight Label → Highlight items Newcomer Label → Mark new products Discount Label → Already shows the discount in % in the listing Variant Label → Mark products with variants Manufacturer Label → Displays the manufacturer

priceModels.bookingText: Labels & Badges | individual | listing & details page - SW6
Labels & Badges | individual | listing & details page - SW6

comments.text: Läuft smooth, keine Fehler und extrem viele Einstellungsmöglichkeiten. TOP!
comments.headline: Sehr gutes Plugin

comments.text:
Works very good! Highly recommended!

The only thing missing is to be able to remove the decimals from the percentage discount (e.g display "25%" instead of "25.01%" etc).
comments.headline: Works very good!

comments.text:
Das Plugin weiß zu begeistern und am liebsten hätte ich sogar 5 statt 3 individualisierbare Labels ;-). 
Ein Fehler im Plugin wurde durch eine Supportanfrage und einer Plugin-Aktualisierung in weniger als 12 Stunden korrigiert. Besser gehts nicht. Vielen Dank!
comments.headline: Perfekte Reaktion auf Supportanfrage und ein Plugin mit Mehrwert
Dieses Plugin entspricht ganz meinen Vorstellungen. Sehr gut umgesetzt!

changelog.text:
• Compatibility: Established compatibility with Shopware 6.5.0.0.
  • Compatibility: Replaced `data-toggle` with `data-bs-toggle`.
  • Compatibility: Replaced `data-placement` with `data-bs-placement`
• Optimization: Added deployment server check in ThemeVariablesSubscriber.
• Bugfix: Workaround for (NEXT-24500)
• Optimization: Added translation of custom configuration alerts.

• Optimization: Simplify icon includes.
  • Optimization: Prevents displaying empty custom labels because of snippet reset shopware bug.
• Compatibility: Shopware 6.4.15 - Fix twig source path for icons.
• Bugfix: Changed Twig syntax to support older Shopware versions.
• Feature: Added sold out badge.

• Feature: Added default text to individual badges
  • Feature: New custom fields to disabled individual badges with default values
  • Feature: Added new configuration to add pre-texts on stock-badge
  • Feature: Added new release date badge.
  • Feature: Added new preorder badge.
• Bugfix: Changed `product.calculatedPrice.listPrice.percentage` into `price.listPrice.percentage` due to cheapest price logic from NEXT-12169

• Feature: Added new configuration for rounding discount badge.
  • Optimization: Removes the removeConfiguration function from the Bootstrap plugin
  • Optimization: Revision of the CustomFields definitions.
• Bugfix: Added missing color configurations to ThemeVariablesSubscriber.

The text & tooltip configuration fields have been replaced by translatable snippet fields in the plugin configuration and may have to be configured again with the desired values after the update.


  • Feature: Added Translations in the plugin configuration
  • Feature: New Label for sales
  • Optimization: Compatibility with shopping experience product pages
  • Optimization: Revision of the subscriber and plugin configuration in twig files

• Optimization: Revision of the plugin configuration
  • Optimization: Renamed SCSS-Variables from `zen-databadges` into `zen-data-badges`
  • Optimization: Revision of the bootstrap plugin lifecycle methods
  • Compatibility: Added new StorefrontRenderEvent because the labels were no longer displayed on the cached page.
  • Bugfix: Prevents the default values from being set again in the configuration when the plugin is activated.

• Optimization: Revision of the plugin configuration
  • Optimization: Removed Additional query on stock badge so that values <= 0 are also displayed

Compatibility with Shopware 6.4.0.0

  • Compatibility: Changed {% spaceless %} to {% apply spaceless %}
  • Compatibility: Removed SCSS workaround because NEXT-7365 is fixed
  • Optimization: Removed calc-function in SCSS default value and use simple math of SCSS itself because of different behavior when compiling on install then compiling the theme
  • Optimization: Added prefix to SCSS variables
  • Optimization: Added prefix to TWIG variables
• Bugfix: Newcomer label text and tooltip

• Bugfix: Corrects a query when transferring color variables to the theme compiler


Please note the changelog instruction from version 2.0.0, if you are updating from a version <2.0.0.

• Compatibility with Shopware 6.2.0
  • Introducing new color picker selection in plugin configuration, which is available since SW 6.2.0
  • New Subscriber to add custom SCSS variables through plugin config - NEXT-5116
  • Changed product.stock to product.availableStock as the database of the Instock Badge
  • Feature: Discount Badge added.
  • Feature: Manufacturer Badge added.
  • Feature: Variant Badge added.
  • Bugfix: Prevents escaping of custom-css condfiguration output.


UPDATE GUIDE:

After the update, the following steps must be carried out:

Because of Shopware Bug: https://issues.shopware.com/issues/NEXT-8355

  1. Deactivate Plugin (Settings are retained)
  2. Activate Plugin
  3. Save Plugin configuration, again
  4. Compile Theme

Only now does the new Shopware Event ThemeCompilerEnrichScssVariablesEvent know the settings stored in the configuration.

ERROR MESSAGE:

Plugin could not be activated - the following error appears:

"Plugin could not be activated due to error message "Unable to compile the theme "Storefront". Undefined variable [...]"

Because of Shopware Bugs: https://issues.shopware.com/issues/NEXT-8043 bzw. https://issues.shopware.com/issues/NEXT-7365

Solution:
Under custom/plugins/zenitPlatformDataBadgesBar/src/Resources/app/storefront/src/scss you habe to delete all files and directories except the base.scss.

Warning: Do not delete the files in the "_scss" folder but in the "scss" folder.

- Compatibility with Shopware 6.1.3

- New configuration for font-sizes

• Initial plugin release
  • Compatibility with Shopware 6.1.0
